replies.body: He say's he had to get the Garena launcher cause the regular download button wouldnt work

> [{quoted}](name=Apocalypse Riven,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=k47RM1ld,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-02T00:43:28.157+0000)
>
> He say's he had to get the Garena launcher cause the regular download button wouldnt work

He probably needs the NA install of the game.

Here is a direct link to the installer on the akamai filehosting riot uses, which is where you are redirected when the download button _does_ work: https://riotgamespatcher-a.akamaihd.net/releases/live/installer/deploy/League%20of%20Legends%20installer%20NA.exe

If the link looks suspicious, look up akamai, they are widely used by online games and entirely reputable.
Could you take screenshots and post pictures of the issue you are running into?
